title: What should I do besides BSc? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what BSc you are doing. But there are some things that every BSc student should do. Develop your personality and leadership qualities: This can be done by participating in sports and cultural activities in your college this also lets you to come in contact with your seniors who can guide you for your future.There are many certificate courses offered by several govt institutes. These courses are very good for your CV as well as you can learn a skill. Find courses which are related to your field.Practice quantitative reasoning and objective english. This will be useful for your future if you are planning to prepare for any govt exam or CAT.If you had not studied Maths in 12th then I would suggest u to study it and give exam through NIOS.If you have lots free time then you should try learning programming. If you find programming very hard or boring, at least learn to operate word ,excel and powerpoint these will always come handy in any job that you will do.Don’t loose focus from your degree. However easy your syllabus may be try to score good grades in your college. It does matters when you will go for a job interview.Best of luck
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Biswa Bhusan Prusty

response.answer_text: This is a very good question now firstly if you have some other passions or dreams let’s say you can side by side upload youtube videos or you can learn a language or you can go for summer internships and also remember in these 3 years learn some new skills or soft skills which are not in your course. Go in all types of co curricular activities just fill up your CV Best of luck.
